snippet: The police arrested 57 activists who used a truck on Tuesday to break through two security barriers and ram their way into a nuclear power plant in eastern France, the organization said.
abstract: Police arrest 57 Greenpeace activists who used truck to break through security barriers and enter nuclear power plant in eastern France; Greenpeace wants immediate shutdown of the plant, which has been operating since 1977.
lead_paragraph: The police arrested 57 activists who used a truck on Tuesday to break through two security barriers and ram their way into a nuclear power plant in eastern France, the organization said.

headline.main: France: Greenpeace Activists Arrested in Break-In
headline.print_headline: France: Greenpeace Activists Arrested in Break-In
